description: Spec is the desired configuration of the external Cilium workload.

ipv4-alloc-cidr.description: IPv4AllocCIDR is the range of IPv4 addresses in the CIDR format that the external workload can use to allocate IP addresses for the tunnel device and the health endpoint.

ipv6-alloc-cidr.description: IPv6AllocCIDR is the range of IPv6 addresses in the CIDR format that the external workload can use to allocate IP addresses for the tunnel device and the health endpoint.
